title: Vaccine safety
cleaned_text: one of the best vaccine safety programs in the world. Here are some important things you should know about vaccine safety. [](https://immunizebc.ca/vaccine-safety/testing-approval-and-monitoring) All vaccines undergo an in-depth testing process and must be shown to be safe and effective before being approved in Canada. After a vaccine is approved, its safety is continuously monitored. [](https://immunizebc.ca/vaccine-safety/ingredients) Vaccines contain small amounts of specific ingredients, all of which play necessary and important roles.
